## TextAreaBuilderOptions.keyMap property

Custom key bindings.

**Signature:**

```typescript
keyMap?: KeyMap$2;
```

## Remarks

Override default key bindings for navigation and editing actions. If not provided, uses default Vi-like key bindings (arrow keys, j/k for up/down, etc.).
